Summary: Round sphere shape /glowing like sun came out/pulsating energy.
trends: There have been 52 other sightings in Chandler
There were no other sightings in Chandler on or around September 30th 1973
divs: sighting detailsthis is first time i had the guts to tell my story. i was in the united states air force, stationed at williams afb, chandler arizonia. the years was either 1972 or 1973 maybe october its been a long time. this incident was in the airizona republic news paper at that time. i worked in base operations at williams afb was on duty that night i filed flight plans for pilots who where in pilot training.no flying that night, gca (ground approch control) called me on hot line to tell me that there was something unusual on his gca scope 10 miles southwest of williams afb , he was picking up some sort of object which was being painted on his scope. so the ops officer and i checked with all agencys such as artc sectors working area around williams afb. they said no traffic flying in my area. then i called flight service station at sky harbor airport, they said nothing flying in our area too. it was very intersting that no agencys where picking up on radar except our gca unit. the ops officer and i went out to the gca unit ourselfs to see in on the gca scope.when we got to gca unit out on the field we could see this sphere round in shape glowing yellow\white color 10 miles to the southwest of williams afb. it was floating just obove the horizon in line of sight. then went into gca unit and observed it on the gca scope. at 10 miles it just glowed on the target being painted by the scope when the scope was on the back side of scope or dark side of scope, there was so much energy coming form object it would light up the bca scoup every time it pulsated its energy. true fact the gca officer on duty that night saw it ops officer saw it and i saw it. went back to base ops and command post called me to ask what was up i explained to them what was happing the commmand post was getting civilian calls wanting to know about see this object. inturn said to the public don't know. i guess the commanding officer of williams afb told command post to tell us not speak to media or outside sources or we would be court martialed. faa flight service station called me back on the landline and told me that a few of the guys went to the top of faa building roof and could see this sphere 40 miles to southeast of there position like a spere glowing like the sun came out. the also said the watched it from a stand still where it was hovering move to the west and disapear over the mountains in about four or five seconds flat like a white strik going acorss the sky and disapearing across the west mountains which from its position was about 90 to 100 miles across that was moving fast to go that far and disapera in four to five seconds. end of my story.
